User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the HTML Reader application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity, matches Firebase Auth UID.

UploadedGame.title: UploadedGame
UploadedGame.description: Represents an HTML game uploaded by a user.

userId.description: Reference to the User who uploaded the game.

authorName.description: The display name of the user who uploaded the game.

htmlCode.description: The HTML code for the game.

uploadDate.description: The date and time when the game was uploaded, as a server timestamp.

class.description: The target grade level for the game.

subject.description: The subject matter the game is related to (e.g., Matematika, Fisika, Sejarah).

views.description: Number of times the game has been viewed.

UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile information.

bio.description: A short biography of the user.

photoURL.description: URL to the user's profile picture.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: Represents a comment on a game.

gameId.description: Reference to the game being commented on.

userId.description: Reference to the User who wrote the comment.

authorName.description: The display name of the user who wrote the comment.

authorPhotoURL.description: URL to the commenter's profile picture.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the comment was posted, as a server timestamp.

/publishedGames/{gameId}.description: Stores published games for public access. Anyone can read, while creation, updates, and deletion are restricted to the content owner.

/publishedGames/{gameId}/comments/{comme.description: Stores comments for a specific game. Anyone can read, signed-in users can create, and owners can delete/update.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public user profile data, editable by the owner.
